price: 43. Oyo nde lifelo тропа batomboki oyo batiyaki tembe na yango.
arabic: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: hādhihi jahannamu allatī yukadhibu bihā al-muj'rimūna
